title: {{SERVER}} | Support System
description:
Identify Your Issue,
Think about your query or issue to help us assist you efficiently.

Select Support Button,
Click the button that best matches your support need.

Wait for Assistance,
After selection, please wait patiently for our team to contact you.

Provide Details,
Share relevant details about your issue for effective help.

Resolution,
Our team will work towards a prompt and satisfactory solution..

*****Please make sure your DMs are turned on as the bot will DM you your questions!*****
